reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be of professional quality, perfect for cold weather, and appreciate that it looks good both buttoned and unbuttoned. The sweater is comfortable, true to size, and features a beautiful shade of green. While many customers like the long length, some note that the sleeves are surprisingly short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Spring, Fall or Winter!
items.body: Sweater is beautiful. Warm enough but not so bulky that it makes you look like a football player or the Michelin Man. When it's colder, add some gloves and big scarf and you won't even need a winter jacket. Very happy with quality, seller & shipping! Read more
items.author: angelface

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect work or casual cardigan
items.body: Great length, accurate color and size. Ordered the small camel color. Read more
items.author: Jc2014

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits great and just what I was looking for!
items.body: The quality is good and the fit is great. I am always leery about clothing made in China, since the items typically run large. This one, however, runs true to size. I am only giving 4 stars since it does have a small pull in the arm area by the seam. I was able to push it through to the inside and tie it off, so it should be fine. Read more
items.author: Scott Beck

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the buttons, thickness, cable design, pockets, and fit.
items.body: I am 65 years old and weigh 225. I am 5'6" and size XL fit me fine. I have been chilly this winter and I like the buttons, thickness, cable design, pockets, and fit. I bought this sweater in green, brown, and black! I hope they do not develop pilling. I will aim to not wash these for as long as possible. (If/when they need washing, I will wash each one by hand and lay it flat to dry on a towel in the bathtub.) I would have preferred if these were made of cotton rather than acrylic, but I do find these to be warm and cozy, which is nice. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft, color is as shown
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. Living in Florida it will be great for cooler temperatures. Read more
items.author: Linda G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend buying
items.body: Love this cardigan, just stunning highly recommend buying Read more
items.author: Stephannie Polanco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Green sweater
items.body: It is a very good product to wear and keep you warm Read more
items.author: Mrs greer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sleeves too short
items.body: I had high hopes for this cardigan — the cable-knit design, long cut, and pockets all looked great in the photos — but unfortunately it missed the mark for me. What I liked: • The style and knit pattern are attractive and exactly as pictured. • The fabric feels reasonably soft, and the pockets are a nice touch for casual wear. What didn’t work: • The sizing is very inconsistent. I ordered a medium, and while the overall body and width were huge and overwhelmingly baggy, the sleeves were surprisingly short, which made the fit feel even more awkward. • Because of that odd proportion, it didn’t drape nicely — instead it looked shapeless and mismatched, more like a robe than a cardigan. • It wasn’t flattering at all, even for a relaxed or cozy style. Bottom line: If you like an intentionally oversized, slouchy look, this might work, but the proportions are off. My medium was gigantic everywhere except the sleeves, which were too short, so I’m returning it. Read more
items.author: WendyBG

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, White, Beige, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
